title: STORM IN A TEACUP video quality upgrade

sources.title: STORM IN A TEACUP video quality upgrade
sources.description: This print is uncropped and much sharper than the existing IA copy. An A-feature British comedy in which a Scottish bi-election goes wildly off the rails and literally to the dogs. Its excellent cast is led by Vivien Leigh, Rex Harrison and Cecil Parker. The production values are first rate. An adaptation of the play by Bruno Frank. Directed by Ian Dairymple & Victor Saville. UK release 1937. US release 1938. Complete Print. TRIVIA: First telecast July 16, 1950 on NYC's WPIX Channel 11.
